DOC.criteria: Histologically proven renal cell carcinoma clear cell histology metastases Evidence measurable disease Radiographic evidence disease progression within 3 month completion bevacizumabbased treatment Prior radical partial nephrectomy Prior treatment antiangiogenic therapy bevacizumab Prior systemic treatment RCC > 2 regimen History know brain metastasis Serious acute chronic illness recent history significant cardiac abnormality
